txt.en: There are half-orc scouts ranging the fields south of Torsbury, threatening the farms and pasture-lands of the Broadacres.
There are many half-orcs threatening the fields of the Broadacres.
You discovered a queer badge upon one of the half-orc riders
You should dispatch some of the half-orc scouts threatening the farms and fields of the Broadacres.
Mounted half-orcs may be found throughout the fields south of Torsbury.\n\nYou should dispatch some of the half-orc scouts threatening the farms and fields of the Broadacres.
There are half-orc scouts ranging the fields south of Torsbury. You should dispatch some of them.
